Sql.query: select nvl(max(revcodi), 0) + 1 from tr_reporteversion_sp7
select nvl(min(revcodi), 0) - 1 from tr_reporteversion_sp7 where revcodi<0

insert into tr_reporteversion_sp7( revcodi, vercodi, emprcodi, revfecha, revsumaciccpsmed, revsumaciccpsest, revsumaciccpsestnoalm, revsumaciccpsalm, revsumaciccpsmedc, revsumaciccpsestc, revsumaciccpsestnoalmc, revsumaciccpsalmc, revnummed, revnumest, revnumestnoalm, revnumalm, revnummedc, revnumestc, revnumestnoalmc, revnumalmc, revnummedcsindef, revnumestcsindef, revnumalmcsindef, revtfse, revtfss, revttotal, revfactdisp, revciccpe, revciccpemedest, revciccpecrit, revttng, revusucreacion, revfeccreacion, revusumodificacion, revfecmodificacion ) values( :revcodi, :vercodi, :emprcodi, :revfecha, :revsumaciccpsmed, :revsumaciccpsest, :revsumaciccpsestnoalm, :revsumaciccpsalm, :revsumaciccpsmedc, :revsumaciccpsestc, :revsumaciccpsestnoalmc, :revsumaciccpsalmc, :revnummed, :revnumest, :revnumestnoalm, :revnumalm, :revnummedc, :revnumestc, :revnumestnoalmc, :revnumalmc, :revnummedcsindef, :revnumestcsindef, :revnumalmcsindef, :revtfse, :revtfss, :revttotal, :revfactdisp, :revciccpe, :revciccpemedest, :revciccpecrit, :revttng, :revusucreacion, :revfeccreacion, :revusumodificacion, :revfecmodificacion )

update tr_reporteversion_sp7 set vercodi = :vercodi, emprcodi = :emprcodi, revfecha = :revfecha, revsumaciccpsmed = :revsumaciccpsmed, revsumaciccpsest = :revsumaciccpsest, revsumaciccpsestnoalm = :revsumaciccpsestnoalm, revsumaciccpsalm = :revsumaciccpsalm, revsumaciccpsmedc = :revsumaciccpsmedc, revsumaciccpsestc = :revsumaciccpsestc, revsumaciccpsestnoalmc = :revsumaciccpsestnoalmc, revsumaciccpsalmc = :revsumaciccpsalmc, revnummed = :revnummed, revnumest = :revnumest, revnumestnoalm = :revnumestnoalm, revnumalm = :revnumalm, revnummedc = :revnummedc, revnumestc = :revnumestc, revnumestnoalmc = :revnumestnoalmc, revnumalmc = :revnumalmc, revnummedcsindef = :revnummedcsindef, revnumestcsindef = :revnumestcsindef, revnumalmcsindef = :revnumalmcsindef, revtfse = :revtfse, revtfss = :revtfss, revttotal = :revttotal, revfactdisp = :revfactdisp, revciccpe = :revciccpe, revciccpemedest = :revciccpemedest, revciccpecrit = :revciccpecrit, revttng = :revttng, revusucreacion = :revusucreacion, revfeccreacion = :revfeccreacion, revusumodificacion = :revusumodificacion, revfecmodificacion = :revfecmodificacion where revcodi = :revcodi
delete from tr_reporteversion_sp7 where revcodi = :revcodi
delete from tr_reporteversion_sp7 where vercodi = :vercodi

select revcodi, vercodi, emprcodi, revfecha, revsumaciccpsmed, revsumaciccpsest, revsumaciccpsestnoalm, revsumaciccpsalm, revsumaciccpsmedc, revsumaciccpsestc, revsumaciccpsestnoalmc, revsumaciccpsalmc, revnummed, revnumest, revnumestnoalm, revnumalm, revnummedc, revnumestc, revnumestnoalmc, revnumalmc, revnummedcsindef, revnumestcsindef, revnumalmcsindef, revtfse, revtfss, revttotal, revfactdisp, revciccpe, revciccpemedest, revciccpecrit, revttng, revusucreacion, revfeccreacion, revusumodificacion, revfecmodificacion from tr_reporteversion_sp7 where revcodi = :revcodi

select revcodi, vercodi, emprcodi, revfecha, revsumaciccpsmed, revsumaciccpsest, revsumaciccpsestnoalm, revsumaciccpsalm, revsumaciccpsmedc, revsumaciccpsestc, revsumaciccpsestnoalmc, revsumaciccpsalmc, revnummed, revnumest, revnumestnoalm, revnumalm, revnummedc, revnumestc, revnumestnoalmc, revnumalmc, revnummedcsindef, revnumestcsindef, revnumalmcsindef, revtfse, revtfss, revttotal, revfactdisp, revciccpe, revciccpemedest, revciccpecrit, revttng, revusucreacion, revfeccreacion, revusumodificacion, revfecmodificacion from tr_reporteversion_sp7

select revcodi, vercodi, emprcodi, revfecha, revsumaciccpsmed, revsumaciccpsest, revsumaciccpsestnoalm, revsumaciccpsalm, revsumaciccpsmedc, revsumaciccpsestc, revsumaciccpsestnoalmc, revsumaciccpsalmc, revnummed, revnumest, revnumestnoalm, revnumalm, revnummedc, revnumestc, revnumestnoalmc, revnumalmc, revnummedcsindef, revnumestcsindef, revnumalmcsindef, revtfse, revtfss, revttotal, revfactdisp, revciccpe, revciccpemedest, revciccpecrit, revttng, revusucreacion, revfeccreacion, revusumodificacion, revfecmodificacion from tr_reporteversion_sp7 where vercodi={0}

select emprcodi, sum(revsumaciccpsmed) revsumaciccpsmed, sum(revsumaciccpsest) revsumaciccpsest, sum(revsumaciccpsestnoalm) revsumaciccpsestnoalm, sum(revsumaciccpsalm) revsumaciccpsalm, sum(revsumaciccpsmedc) revsumaciccpsmedc, sum(revsumaciccpsestc) revsumaciccpsestc, sum(revsumaciccpsestnoalmc) revsumaciccpsestnoalmc, sum(revsumaciccpsalmc) revsumaciccpsalmc, sum(revnummed) revnummed, sum(revnumest) revnumest, sum(revnumestnoalm) revnumestnoalm, sum(revnumalm) revnumalm, sum(revnummedc) revnummedc, sum(revnumestc) revnumestc, sum(revnumestnoalmc) revnumestnoalmc, sum(revnumalmc) revnumalmc, sum(revnummedcsindef) revnummedcsindef, sum(revnumestcsindef) revnumestcsindef, sum(revnumalmcsindef) revnumalmcsindef, sum(revtfse) revtfse, sum(revtfss) revtfss, sum(revttotal) revttotal, sum(revfactdisp) revfactdisp, sum(revciccpe) revciccpe, sum(revciccpemedest) revciccpemedest, sum(revciccpecrit) revciccpecrit, sum(revttng) revttng from tr_reporteversion_sp7 where vercodi={0} and revfecha>=to_date('{1} 00:00:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and revfecha <=to_date('{2} 00:00:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and emprcodi in ( select emprcodi from tr_empresa_sp7 where emprfecingris <= revfecha) group by emprcodi

select revcodi, vercodi, emprcodi, revfecha, revsumaciccpsmed, revsumaciccpsest, revsumaciccpsestnoalm, revsumaciccpsalm, revsumaciccpsmedc, revsumaciccpsestc, revsumaciccpsestnoalmc, revsumaciccpsalmc, revnummed, revnumest, revnumestnoalm, revnumalm, revnummedc, revnumestc, revnumestnoalmc, revnumalmc, revnummedcsindef, revnumestcsindef, revnumalmcsindef, revtfse, revtfss, revttotal, revfactdisp, revciccpe, revciccpemedest, revciccpecrit, revttng, revusucreacion, revfeccreacion, revusumodificacion, revfecmodificacion from tr_reporteversion_sp7

select * from ( select a.revcodi,b.vercodi,b.verfechaini,a.emprcodi,a.revfecha, a.revsumaciccpsmed,a.revsumaciccpsest,a.revsumaciccpsestnoalm,a.revsumaciccpsalm,a.revsumaciccpsmedc, a.revsumaciccpsestc,a.revsumaciccpsestnoalmc,a.revsumaciccpsalmc,a.revnummed,a.revnumest, a.revnumestnoalm,a.revnumalm,a.revnummedc,a.revnumestc,a.revnumestnoalmc, a.revnumalmc,a.revnummedcsindef,a.revnumestcsindef,a.revnumalmcsindef,a.revtfse, a.revtfss,a.revttotal,a.revfactdisp,a.revciccpe,a.revciccpemedest, a.revciccpecrit,a.revttng,a.revusucreacion,a.revfeccreacion,a.revusumodificacion, a.revfecmodificacion, (a.Revnummed + a.Revnumest) CanGeneral, (a.Revnummed + a.Revnumestnoalm) CanMedEst, (a.Revnummedc + a.Revnumestc) CanCritico, c.emprenomb, (row_number() over (order by c.emprenomb,a.revfecha)) as r from tr_reporteversion_sp7 a, tr_version_sp7 b, tr_empresa_sp7 c where (b.vercodi= a.vercodi) and (c.emprcodi=a.emprcodi) and (a.vercodi={0} or {0} = 0) and a.revfecha!=to_date('31/12/9999','dd/mm/yyyy') and ( (a.revfecha >= to_date('{1} 00:00:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and a.revfecha < to_date('{2} 00:00:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')+1) ) order by c.emprenomb,a.revfecha ) where (r >= ((({3}-1) * {4}) + 1) and r < (({3} * {4}) + 1 )) or ({3} = -1 and {4} = -1)

select * from ( select a.revcodi, b.vercodi, b.verfechaini,b.verfechafin, c.emprenomb,a.revfactdisp,a.revciccpe,a.revciccpemedest,a.revciccpecrit, (a.Revnummed + a.Revnumest) CanGeneral, (a.Revnummed + a.Revnumestnoalm) CanMedEst, (a.Revnummedc + a.Revnumestc) CanCritico, a.emprcodi, a.revusucreacion,a.revfeccreacion,a.revusumodificacion,a.revfecmodificacion, (row_number() over (order by c.emprenomb,b.verfechaini)) as r from tr_reporteversion_sp7 a, tr_version_sp7 b, tr_empresa_sp7 c where (b.vercodi= a.vercodi) and (c.emprcodi=a.emprcodi) and (a.vercodi={0} or {0} = 0) and a.revfecha=to_date('31/12/9999','dd/mm/yyyy') and ( (b.verfechaini >= to_date('{1} 00:00:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and b.verfechafin < to_date('{2} 00:00:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')+1) ) order by c.emprenomb,b.verfechaini ) where (r >= ((({3}-1) * {4}) + 1) and r < (({3} * {4}) + 1 )) or ({3} = -1 and {4} = -1)

select count(*) from tr_reporteversion_sp7 a,tr_version_sp7 b where (b.vercodi= a.vercodi) and (a.vercodi={0} or {0} = 0) and ( (a.revfecha >= to_date('{1} 00:00:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and a.revfecha < to_date('{2} 00:00:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')+1) )

select b.revfecha,a.vernumero,trunc(b.revciccpe*100,2) revciccpe from tr_version_sp7 a, tr_reporteversion_sp7 b where a.vercodi=b.vercodi and b.emprcodi={0} and to_number(to_char(a.verfechaini,'MM')) = ({1}) and to_number(to_char(a.verfechaini,'YYYY')) = ({2}) and a.verfechaini=a.verfechafin and a.vercodi=( select nvl(vercodi,0) vercodi from tr_version_sp7 where verfechaini=verfechafin and verfechaini=b.revfecha and vernumero=(select max(vernumero) from tr_version_sp7 where verfechaini=verfechafin and verfechaini=b.revfecha) ) order by a.verfechaini desc

select b.emprcodi,trunc(b.revciccpe*100,2) revciccpe from tr_version_sp7 a, tr_reporteversion_sp7 b where a.vercodi=b.vercodi and b.emprcodi={0} and to_number(to_char(a.verfechaini,'DD')) = ({1}) and to_number(to_char(a.verfechaini,'MM')) = ({2}) and to_number(to_char(a.verfechaini,'YYYY')) = ({3}) and a.verfechaini=a.verfechafin and a.vercodi=( select nvl(vercodi,0) vercodi from tr_version_sp7 where verfechaini=verfechafin and verfechaini=b.revfecha and vernumero=(select max(vernumero) from tr_version_sp7 where verfechaini=verfechafin and verfechaini=b.revfecha) ) order by a.verfechaini desc

select sum(suma) from ( select H0 + H1 + H2 + H3 + H4 + H5 + H6 + H7 + H8 + H9 + H10 + H11 + H12 + H13 + H14 + H15 + H16 + H17 + H18 + H19 + H20 + H21 + H22 + H23 + H24 + H25 + H26 + H27 + H28 + H29 + H30 + H31 + H32 + H33 + H34 + H35 + H36 + H37 + H38 + H39 + H40 + H41 + H42 + H43 + H44 + H45 + H46 + H47 + H48 + H49 + H50 + H51 + H52 + H53 + H54 + H55 + H56 + H57 + H58 + H59 as suma from TR_ESTADEMPRESAMIN_SP7 sp7 where sp7.emprcodi = {1} and to_date(to_char(sp7.STDEMMFECHA, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') = to_date('{0}', 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_number(to_char(sp7.STDEMMFECHA,'HH24')) >= {2} and sp7.vercodi in ( select nvl(tr.vercodi,0) vercodi from tr_version_sp7 tr where tr.verfechaini=tr.verfechafin and tr.verfechaini=to_date('{0}', 'YYYY-MM-DD') and tr.vernumero=( select max(tr1.vernumero) from tr_version_sp7 tr1 where tr1.verfechaini=tr1.verfechafin and tr1.verfechaini=to_date('{0}', 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) ))

select sum(suma) from ( select {3} as suma from TR_ESTADEMPRESAMIN_SP7 sp7 where sp7.emprcodi = {1} and to_date(to_char(sp7.STDEMMFECHA, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') = to_date('{0}', 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_number(to_char(sp7.STDEMMFECHA,'HH24')) = {2} and sp7.vercodi in ( select nvl(tr.vercodi,0) vercodi from tr_version_sp7 tr where tr.verfechaini=tr.verfechafin and tr.verfechaini=to_date('{0}', 'YYYY-MM-DD') and tr.vernumero=( select max(tr1.vernumero) from tr_version_sp7 tr1 where tr1.verfechaini=tr1.verfechafin and tr1.verfechaini=to_date('{0}', 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) ))
